feed.title: Pink Scales2
feed.tagline: Welcome to the Pink Scales Group website www.pinkscales.com. The Pink Scales Group of companies provide services to the music industry and artists alike. It is our aim to be the first choice for your project however big or small. Pink Scales is different, we are a collaboration of music industry professionals and artists with many years of experience and success, brought together to provide a better service for you.

entry.title: Star Academy 4
entry.summary: David Coulommiers has recently contributed to two major, top-selling albums in France. Star Academy 4 (Universal/Mercury) has been a huge success and allowed David to show his innovative programming to its full. Using old and new musical technology, he has...
entry.dc:subject: news
entry.content:
David Coulommiers has recently contributed to two major, top-selling albums in France. Star Academy 4 (Universal/Mercury) has been a huge success and allowed David to show his innovative programming to its full. Using old and new musical technology, he has strengthened and added his unique touches to both albums.

Earlier this year, David also added his signature programming to the Elodie Fregé, platinum-selling album,

Élodie Frégé has recently gone platinum in her native France with help from Pink Scales very own David Coulommiers who worked on her album.

entry.title: In-house project. (DC/MW/G)
entry.summary: The latest inhouse project from Pink Scales has a dark, artistic feel. Influenced by the likes of Massive Attack and Bjork, it goes to the next level and takes on a highly unique life of its own. Finally Little India...
entry.dc:subject: downloads
entry.content:
The latest inhouse project from Pink Scales has a dark, artistic feel. Influenced by the likes of Massive Attack and Bjork, it goes to the next level and takes on a highly unique life of its own.

Finally
Little India

Our latest download is an inhouse project called Finally.

entry.title: David Coulommiers - Programmer/writer/producer
entry.summary: David is a highly innovative programmer and has worked extensively in this area, contributing to works by a broad range of artists including Elodie Fregé (UniversalMercury), Star Academy France, Shaggy, Ste McNally, BBMAK etc. His studio houses an impressive programming/recording...
entry.dc:subject: services
entry.content:
David is a highly innovative programmer and has worked extensively in this area, contributing to works by a broad range of artists including Elodie Fregé (UniversalMercury), Star Academy France, Shaggy, Ste McNally, BBMAK etc. His studio houses an impressive programming/recording rig along with David's vintage synths which include Fender Rhodes, MiniMoogs , MS20, TB303,VCS-3 Putney,CS-80 etc which he uses to create his innovative sound. He is highly skilled with all todays sampling technology, of which he also has a vast library. Sound Design, incorporating Symphonic Orchestral works show his amazing talents to their full - David has a complete PRO VSL station and also uses Miroslave Vitous and EWQL Symphonic Orchestra. Established in his native France as a gifted writer, he has worked on many sountrack projects, including work for Buena Vista (ABC, Disney) showcasing his signature orchestral/string arrangements. During the last year he has contributed to several 'number one' selling albums and is now concentrating on production and artist development.

The Pink Scales rosta consists of many experienced engineers, writers, programmers and producers. Included in this is our ‘core’ group, a highly experienced team used to working together on many projects. Each member of the ‘core’ group has a different strength and also heads their own team. To find out more please visit the services section.

entry.title: Max Wilson - Writer/Instrumentalist/Producer.
entry.summary: Prior to joining Pink scales, Max has been working with well-known producers, programmers, writers and performers, including James Sanger (Keane, Dido, Phil Collins, U2) honing her talents. As one of Pink Scales most experienced members she is a prolific and...
entry.dc:subject: services
entry.content:
Prior to joining Pink scales, Max has been working with well-known producers, programmers, writers and performers, including James Sanger (Keane, Dido, Phil Collins, U2) honing her talents. As one of Pink Scales most experienced members she is a prolific and highly talented songwriter. Max, who is also an accomplished instrumentalist, has completed the recording of her second album and is now concentrating on artist development.

The Pink Scales rosta consists of many experienced engineers, writers, programmers and producers. Included in this is our ‘core’ group, a highly experienced team used to working together on many projects. Each member of the ‘core’ group has a different strength and also heads their own team. To find out more please visit the services section.

entry.title: Gabriel - Programmer.
entry.summary: Also an accomplished solo performer and DJ, Gabriel uses a classic electronic style in his signature programming work and re-mixing and shows amazing artistic insight. He is also a budding writer and enjoys contributing to sound-track projects currently in production....
entry.dc:subject: services
entry.content:
Also an accomplished solo performer and DJ, Gabriel uses a classic electronic style in his signature programming work and re-mixing and shows amazing artistic insight. He is also a budding writer and enjoys contributing to sound-track projects currently in production.

Gabriel's arrival at the Pink Scales Studios has given a whole new dimension to our programming team. His highly unique trademark samples/sounds bring a fresh approach to all his works.

The Pink Scales rosta consists of many experienced engineers, writers, programmers and producers. Included in this is our ‘core’ group, a highly experienced team used to working together on many projects. Each member of the ‘core’ group has a different strength and also heads their own team. To find out more please visit the services section.

entry.title: Cray Newman - Sound Engineer/Technician.
entry.summary: Cray is a highly talented and experienced sound engineer and technician. He is proficient with all major software packages and owns a portable Pro-Tools rig. Cray has been working on projects around the UK for the last few years and...
entry.dc:subject: services
entry.content:
Cray is a highly talented and experienced sound engineer and technician. He is proficient with all major software packages and owns a portable Pro-Tools rig.

Cray has been working on projects around the UK for the last few years and is a regular choice for our clients.

The Pink Scales rosta consists of many experienced engineers, writers, programmers and producers. Included in this is our ‘core’ group, a highly experienced team used to working together on many projects. Each member of the ‘core’ group has a different strength and also heads their own team. To find out more please visit the services section.

entry.title: Artist Development
entry.summary: New to the Pink Scales family is Ollie Hughes. Ollie is a very talented writer, performer and multi instrumentalist. We are currently busy recording his first solo album and have signed him to a two year development deal. Finally, we...
entry.dc:subject: news
entry.content:
New to the Pink Scales family is Ollie Hughes.

Ollie is a very talented writer, performer and multi instrumentalist. We are currently busy recording his first solo album and have signed him to a two year development deal.

Finally, we would like to wish you a very happy Christmas and peaceful New Year.

entry.title: Pink Scales Studio
entry.summary: The new Pink Scales studios are nearing completion. They will house a complete Protools HD system along with a further two Protools and Motu HD192. The new creative studios combines both the newest technology with vintage sounds, to create the...
entry.dc:subject: news
entry.content: The new Pink Scales studios are nearing completion. They will house a complete Protools HD system along with a further two Protools and Motu HD192. The new creative studios combines both the newest technology with vintage sounds, to create the ultimate recording and programming experience. Superb sound quality in a highly creative and beautiful environment.

entry.title: Film Scores
entry.summary: Here at Pink Scales, we have a keen interest in the creation of scores for film, television and video games. Utilising the latest technology we can compose and produce professional scores for any project. "the mind is free to explore...
entry.dc:subject: filmscores
entry.content:
Here at Pink Scales, we have a keen interest in the creation of scores for film, television and video games. Utilising the latest technology we can compose and produce professional scores for any project.

"the mind is free to explore and invent, boundaries disappear allowing original themes to emerge, taking us along a parallel journey with the visual".....GB
Many examples of film-score projects can be on our downloads page.

At Pink Scales we can use the latest technology to compose and produce professional scores for film, television and video games.

entry.title: Contact
entry.summary: We are happy to receive demos. Please e-mail us first and we will forward postal details. info@pinkscales.com...
entry.dc:subject: contact
entry.content:
We are happy to receive demos. Please e-mail us first and we will forward postal details.
info@pinkscales.com

If you would like more information about Pink Scales please email info@pinkscales.com.
